SEARCH
Package com.paymybuddy.paymybuddy.service

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.paymybuddy.paymybuddy.service.UserService
@Service public class UserService extends Object
Controller for handling user registration processes, including displaying the registration form and processing the registration request.

      public UserService()

  • Method Details

    • existsByUsername

      public boolean existsByUsername(String username)
      Checks if a username already exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to check.
      Returns:
      true if the username exists, false otherwise.

    • existsByEmail

      public boolean existsByEmail(String email)
      Checks if an email already exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      email - The email to check.
      Returns:
      true if the email exists, false otherwise.

    • createUser

      @Transactional public User createUser(RegisterUserDTO userDTO)
      Creates a new user based on the provided registration data. This method ensures that the username and email are unique before creating the user.
      Parameters:
      userDTO - The registration data for the new user.
      Returns:
      The created User object.
      Throws:
      UsernameAlreadyTakenException - If the username is already taken.
      EmailAlreadyUsedException - If the email is already used.

    • updateUser

      @Transactional public User updateUser(UpdateUserDTO userDTO)
      Updates an existing user's information based on the provided update data. This method validates if the new username or email are unique before updating the user.
      Parameters:
      userDTO - The update data for the user.
      Returns:
      The updated User object.
      Throws:
      UsernameAlreadyTakenException - If the new username is already taken.
      EmailAlreadyUsedException - If the new email is already used.

    • getUserById

      public UserDTO getUserById(int id)
      Retrieves a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      A UserDTO containing the user's username, email, and buddies.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If no user is found with the given ID.

    • addBuddy

      @Transactional public void addBuddy(BuddyConnectionDTO buddyConnection)
      Adds a new buddy to the user's buddy list.
      Parameters:
      buddyConnection - The buddy connection data, containing the user and buddy emails.
      Throws:
      SelfAddException - If the user tries to add themselves as a buddy.
      NotFoundException - If the user or buddy is not found.
      BuddyAlreadyAddedException - If the buddy already exists in the user's buddy list.

    • removeBuddy

      @Transactional public void removeBuddy(BuddyConnectionDTO buddyConnection)
      Removes a buddy from the user's buddy list.
      Parameters:
      buddyConnection - The buddy connection data, containing the user and buddy emails.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If the user or buddy is not found.
      NotFoundException - If the buddy connection does not exist.

    • deposit

      @Transactional public void deposit(BalanceOperationDTO operation)
      Processes a deposit operation by updating the user's balance.
      Parameters:
      operation - The balance operation containing the user's email and the amount to deposit.

    • getTransactionsPaginated

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<TransactionInListDTO> getTransactionsPaginated(User user, int page, int size)
      Retrieves a paginated list of transactions for a user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose transactions are to be retrieved.
      page - The page number to retrieve.
      size - The number of transactions per page.
      Returns:
      A paginated Page of TransactionInListDTO objects.

    • getTransactionsPaginated

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<TransactionInListDTO> getTransactionsPaginated(int userId, int page, int size)
      Retrieves a paginated list of transactions for a user by their user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID whose transactions are to be retrieved.
      page - The page number to retrieve.
      size - The number of transactions per page.
      Returns:
      A paginated Page of TransactionInListDTO objects.

    • getUserByEmail

      public User getUserByEmail(String email)
      Retrieves a user by their email.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The User object associated with the given email.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException - If no user is found with the provided email.

    • authenticateUser

      public void authenticateUser(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, String email, String password)
      Authenticates a user with the provided email and password.
      Parameters:
      request - The HTTP request, used for context.
      email - The email of the user to authenticate.
      password - The password of the user to authenticate.

    • getBuddies

      public BuddiesDTO getBuddies(int userId)
      Retrieves the list of buddies for a user, based on the user's ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose buddies are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A BuddiesDTO object containing the list of buddies for the user.
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - If no user is found with the given ID.
